Articles.Content:
Show part axis - I once managed to put on a control surface that turned the wrong way when rolling. The other control surfaces on the same wing turned the right way.

Align part rotation with craft while placing part -key.

Move part while still connected to the same surface, for easier moving of parts without having them rotate on you.

Yeah, it would also hepl with probe cores... On the other hand, there is only a very limited amount of parts that would profit from this, so on second thought I don't really think it's necessary...

Have a nice day!
